events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund inquiry related to order #458372.
Support agent Sofia has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent purchase. How can I assist you further?
Could you please provide the order number and reason for the refund so I can process your request smoothly?
The order number is 458372. The jacket fits very poorly; I tried it on and itâ€™s much smaller than the size chart suggested.
We can initiate a full refund for you once the item is returned. I will send you a prepaid return label shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and help. I appreciate the prepaid return label offer.
The refund process has been initiated, and the return label has been emailed to you. Please send the jacket back at your convenience.
Just checking in to see if you received the return label and if there is anything else we can help you with.
Yes, I received the label and have already sent the jacket back. Thank you for your support.
The refund has been processed successfully. We are closing this case now, and we hope to serve you better next time.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback is important to us and helps improve our service.
